Mamarosa beach

Perfectly located in front of the beach, in the basement of the Hotel W Barcelona, Mamarosa Beach is an ideal option at any time of the year.

The space has a large terrace and an interior dining room perfect for group dinners and all kinds of events. The restaurant has been decorated with taste and adapts wisely at every moment of the day. At noon, the atmosphere is familiar and relaxed; At night, Mamarosa Beach transforms into a vibrant place with cocktails and good music.

The cuisine is Mediterranean with Italian influences and is made with fresh and natural ingredients. In addition, since the beginning of 2018 the restaurant has added a sushi and sashimi menu to its offer

Location: Barceloneta beach

Dining room capacity: Up to 120 pax

Price Level: medium-high

Style: Mediterranean with Italian influences

Vegetarian Options/Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: Yes
